document.paragraph: 2 will be "2" (manually numbered), 3 will be "3" (anonymous auto-numbered), and 1 will be "1" (labeled auto-numbered).

footnote.paragraph: This footnote is labeled manually, so its number is fixed.

footnote.name: label
footnote.paragraph: This autonumber-labeled footnote will be labeled "1". It is the first auto-numbered footnote and no other footnote with label "1" exists. The order of the footnotes is used to determine numbering, not the order of the footnote references.
This footnote will be labeled "3". It is the second auto-numbered footnote, but footnote label "2" is already used.
